feed.title: Machine Logic
feed.subtitle: Formal verification is an established technology in computer firms such as Amazon, Apple, Intel, Microsoft and Nvidia. In recent years, researchers have started asking: could this technology also benefit research mathematicians? This blog explores the issues connected with doing logic on the computer: its foundations, its applications in all their variety and the specific obstacles to formalising mathematics.

entry.title: Welcome to the Machine Logic blog!
